message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and call it $10,500?
I understand that you're willing to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
